casebody.data:
CITY OF STAMFORD et al.
v.
TEN RUGBY STREET, LLC. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 8, 2016. Thomas M. Cassone, Stamford, in support of the petition. James V. Minor, special corporation counsel, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 164 Conn.App. 49 , 137 A.3d 781 (2016), is denied.

McDONALD and ROBINSON, Js., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
